overview.description: Madhya Pradesh, located in central India, is known for its historical monuments, wildlife sanctuaries, and cultural heritage. Established as a state on November 1, 1956, it features attractions like Bhopal and Khajuraho.

top_destinations.name: Bhopal
top_destinations.description: The city of lakes with Upper Lake and Van Vihar National Park.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit the Taj-ul-Masajid; explore the lake.

top_destinations.name: Khajuraho
top_destinations.description: Famous for its erotic temple architecture and UNESCO site.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit the Western Group of Temples; hire a guide.

top_destinations.name: Kanha National Park
top_destinations.description: A tiger reserve inspiring The Jungle Book.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Book a jeep safari; carry binoculars.

accommodation.name: Hotel Kanha Jungle Lodge
accommodation.description: Affordable option near Kanha National Park.

culinary_delights.name: Café Coffee Day
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

culinary_delights.name: Kwality Restaurant
culinary_delights.description: Popular for Indian and Chinese dishes.

culinary_delights.name: Bhoj Restaurant
culinary_delights.description: Famous for local Madhya Pradesh cuisine.

culinary_delights.name: Taj Restaurant
culinary_delights.description: Offers a variety of North Indian specialties.

must_visit_spots.name: Sanchi Stupa
must_visit_spots.description: An ancient Buddhist site with great stupas.

must_visit_spots.name: Khajuraho Temples
must_visit_spots.tip: Attend the light and sound show.

must_visit_spots.name: Pachmarhi
must_visit_spots.description: A hill station with waterfalls and caves.

must_visit_spots.name: Gwalior Fort
must_visit_spots.description: A historic fort with stunning architecture.

must_visit_spots.name: Orchha
must_visit_spots.description: Famous for palaces and temples along the Betwa River.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Bhopal is 780 km from Delhi (NH46, 12-14 hrs). By train: Bhopal Junction connects major cities. By air: Raja Bhoj Airport (Bhopal).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry light clothing; book safaris in advance.
